author: PTI
title: Kashmir reports first death due to coronavirus
description: A 65-year-old man hailing from Hyderpora area of the city died on Thursday, becoming the first fatality in Jammu and Kashmir due to coronavirus. Authorities in Kashmir have expressed apprehensions that the cases could be more than reported in the Valley as a …
content:
As we share the sad news of our first #Covid19 fatality, my heart goes out to the family of the deceased. We stand https://t.co/AppV8P7GHU
— Mayor of Srinagar (@MayorofS) 1585194988000
